reviews.text: It is another nearby shopping mall that is next to velocity. It is an old mall that you can find local brand shops. We can find many shops for moms and kids, children, families, etc.

üü¶ United Square mall is a mixed development building nestled in the heart of Novena district. It comprises of a 30-storey office tower and a 5-storey retail podium.

üü© United Square mall was built in 1982 and this integrated retail-office complex is a popular shopping mall filled with lots of eateries, cafes, restaurants amd retail stores.

üü° It is easily accessible from Novena MRT station. ‚úÖÔ∏è There used to be an underground linkway passage pathway from Novena train station to United Square mall.

üüß However, when the North-South Corridor tunnelling works began in this Novena district = the underground passageway was sealed off.

‚ú≥Ô∏è To get to United Square Mall from Novena Mrt station = ‚úÖÔ∏è you will need to cross the road using the makeshift metal overhead bridge.

This shops are closer to the velocity Mall, and upstairs sort of educational centre. I've seen H & M and some of the children clothings. Right now there's a constructions happening closer to the centre. I'm not sure if there's an under ground but theirs an overpass adjacent to the velocity Mall. So it's kinda close to hop in and hop out. It's have an elevator as well for the people having problem walking upstairs. The chemist and food court located in the basement.
Nice shopping mall with lots of kids tuition centers and cafes. However, outside main road was under construction for ns corridor, which is supposed to be completed around year 2030

The Shopping Mall was recently  renovated and the Food Court offers many delicious  Food Choices. Shoppers can enjoy their meals at the Food Court after their shopping.
.There is an event hall for holding Ad hoc events to attract shoppers
